tok: nimi sina pi toki pona li tan seme?
en: Where does your Toki Pona name come from?

tok: jan seme pi kulupu mama sina li sona toki pona?
en: Who else in your family knows Toki Pona?

tok: jan seme pi sitelen tawa li pona tawa sina?
en: What movie/show characters do you like?

tok: kili seme li pona tawa sina?
en: What's a fruit or vegetable you like?

tok: sina wile kama sona e toki ante seme tan seme?
en: What other languages would you like to learn and why?

tok: musi seme li pona tawa sina?
en: What amusing things do you like?

tok: seli en lete la seme li pona nanpa wan tawa sina?
en: Do you prefer heat or cold?

tok: soweli lili mute en soweli suli wan la sina wile utala e seme?
en: Would you rather fight many small animals or one large animal?

tok: sina wile sitelen lon lipu kepeken luka anu lon ilo nanpa anu seme?
en: Do you prefer writing on paper by hand, with a computer, or some other way?

tok: soweli nasa li lon ala lon tomo sina? sina wile ala wile ni?
en: Do you have any unusual pets? Would you like to?

tok: sina ken tawa lon tenpo la, sina wile tawa lon tenpo seme? sina pali e seme?
en: If you could time travel, where would you go? What would you do?

tok: sina wile toki pona e lipu seme e musi seme?
en: What would you like to translate into/adapt for Toki Pona?

tok: seme li kama lon poka sina li nasa nanpa wan?
en: What's the strangest event that happened close to you?

tok: tomo sona la nasin sona seme li pona tawa sina? ni li tan seme?
en: What is/was your favorite subject in school? Why?

tok: sewi li pana e ijo la ijo seme li pona nanpa wan tawa sina?
en: What is your favorite weather?

tok: mani li suli ala la, sina wile pali seme?
en: If money wasn't important, what job would you like to do?

tok: sina kama sona e toki pona tan seme?
en: Why did you start learning Toki Pona?

tok: soweli seme li suwi tawa sina li jaki tawa jan ante mute?
en: What animal do you find cute that others find ugly?

tok: tenpo poka la sina seme?
en: What have you done recently?

tok: sina sona ala sona e jan poka pi toki pona?
en: Do you know anyone else who speaks toki pona in real life?

tok: jan mute li sona ala e kalama musi seme pi pona mute?
en: What's a great song that most people don't know about?

tok: tomo sina la seme li lon?
en: How would you describe your home?

tok: jan pona sina nanpa wan li pona seme?
en: What is your favorite person like?

tok: ma sina la sina lukin e seme?
en: What does the land you come from look like?

tok: moku seme li pona nanpa wan tawa sina?
en: What is your favorite meal?

tok: sina lon ala tomo la sina seme?
en: If you're outside, what do you like to do?

tok: sina lukin e lipu seme lon tenpo poka?
en: Could you describe the last story or article you read?

tok: sina lukin e sitelen tawa seme lon tenpo poka?
en: What was the last movie or show you watched like?

tok: seme li pona wawa e pilin sina a?
en: What makes your day instantly better?

tok: tenpo poka la, sina toki e seme lon toki pona?
en: What's the last thing you talked about in toki pona?

tok: sina ken tawa ma ale la, sina tawa seme?
en: If you could go anywhere, where would you go?

tok: sina jo e jan pi ken ale la, sina wile e seme tu wan?
en: If you had a genie, which 3 wishes are you picking?

tok: nasin tawa seme li pona tawa sina?
en: What's your favorite method of transportation?

tok: sina wile ala wile awen lon ma ante? wile la, ma seme? tan seme?
en: Do you want to live somewhere else? If so, where? Why?

tok: sina ken kon lon tenpo suno wan la sina tawa seme? sina lukin e seme?
en: If you could be a ghost for a day, where would you go and what would you observe?

tok: sina ken soweli la, sina wile soweli seme?
en: If you could become an animal, what would you be?

tok: sina wile ala wile lon tenpo pini? wile la, tenpo seme?
en: If you could live in a historical period, would you want to? If so, which one?

tok: seme li nasin nasa pi kulupu mama sina?
en: What's a strange tradition or inside joke your family has?

tok: sina ken toki tawa jan wan. ona li ken lon li ken moli. ni la, sina toki tawa jan seme?
en: If you could have a conversation with any person, living or dead, who would you choose?

tok: tomo ale la, sina ken awen lon tomo wan. tomo ni li seme? sina awen lon poka seme?
en: If you could live in any house, what would it be like? Who would you live with? What would be nearby?

tok: tomo sina la, sina awen taso anu lon poka mama anu lon poka pi jan pona anu seme?
en: Do you live by yourself or with family or with roommates/friends?

tok: soweli pona anu akesi pona anu kala pona anu pipi pona anu waso pona li lon ala lon tomo sina? lon la, nimi ona li seme?
en: Do you live with any pets? What are their names?

tok: jan ante li lon tomo sina la sina musi seme?
en: When someone else is at your house, what are some fun things to do?
